verses.verse: אֶל־ <WH413> to חִכְּךָ֣ <WH2441> to thy mouth שֹׁפָ֔ר <WH7782> [Set] the trumpet כַּנֶּ֖שֶׁר <WH5404> [He shall come] as an eagle עַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> against the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because עָבְר֣וּ <WH5674> because they have transgressed בְרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> my covenant וְעַל־ <WH5921> against תּוֹרָתִ֖י <WH8451> against my law פָּשָֽׁעוּ׃ <WH6586> and trespassed
לִ֖י יִזְעָ֑קוּ <WH2199> shall cry אֱלֹהַ֥י <WH430> unto me My God יְֽדַעֲנ֖וּךָ <WH3045> we know יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel
זָנַ֥ח <WH2186> hath cast off יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [the thing that is] good אוֹיֵ֖ב <WH341> the enemy יִרְדְּֽפוֹ׃ <WH7291> shall pursue

הֵ֤ם <WH1992> They הִמְלִיכוּ֙ <WH4427> They have set up kings וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> They הֵשִׂ֖ירוּ <WH8323> have appointed וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדָ֑עְתִּי <WH3045> and I knew כַּסְפָּ֣ם <WH3701> [it] not of their silver וּזְהָבָ֗ם <WH2091> and their gold עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> have they made לָהֶם֙ עֲצַבִּ֔ים <WH6091> them idols לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> because of יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> that they may be cut off

זָנַח֙ <WH2186> hath cast עֶגְלֵ֣ךְ <WH5695> Thy calf שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> O Samaria חָרָ֥ה <WH2734> is kindled אַפִּ֖י <WH639> [thee] off mine anger בָּ֑ם עַד־ <WH5704> long מָתַ֕י <WH4970> How לֹ֥א <WH3808> against them how long [will it be] ere יוּכְל֖וּ <WH3201> they attain נִקָּיֹֽן׃ <WH5356> cleanness

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Surely מִיִּשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> For from Israel וְה֔וּא <WH1931> this חָרָ֣שׁ <WH2796> [was] it also the workman עָשָׂ֔הוּ <WH6213> made וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> is not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> it therefore it [is] not God ה֑וּא <WH1931> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely שְׁבָבִ֣ים <WH7616> shall be broken in pieces יִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become עֵ֖גֶל <WH5695> but the calf שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> the wind יִזְרָ֖עוּ <WH2232> For they have sown וְסוּפָ֣תָה <WH5492> the whirlwind יִקְצֹ֑רוּ <WH7114> and they shall reap קָמָ֣ה <WH7054> it hath no stalk אֵֽין־ <WH369> has ל֗וֹ צֶ֚מַח <WH6780> the bud בְּלִ֣י <WH1097> no יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> shall yield קֶּ֔מַח <WH7058> no meal אוּלַ֣י <WH194> if יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> so be it yield זָרִ֖ים <WH2114> the strangers יִבְלָעֻֽהוּ׃ <WH1104> shall swallow it up

נִבְלַ֖ע <WH1104> is swallowed up יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> are now הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> now shall they be among the Gentiles כִּכְלִ֖י <WH3627> as a vessel אֵֽין־ <WH369> no חֵ֥פֶץ <WH2656> wherein [is] no pleasure בּֽוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they עָל֣וּ <WH5927> For they are gone up אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> to Assyria פֶּ֖רֶא <WH6501> a wild ass בּוֹדֵ֣ד <WH909> alone ל֑וֹ אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> by himself Ephraim הִתְנ֥וּ <WH8566> hath hired אֲהָבִֽים׃ <WH158> lovers

גַּ֛ם <WH1571> Even כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though יִתְנ֥וּ <WH8566> Yea though they have hired בַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the nations עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <WH6908> now will I gather וַיָּחֵ֣לּוּ <WH2490> them and they shall sorrow מְּעָ֔ט <WH4592> a little מִמַּשָּׂ֖א <WH4853> for the burden מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king שָׂרִֽים׃ <WH8269> of princes

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Since הִרְבָּ֥ה <WH7235> hath made many אֶפְרַ֛יִם <WH669> Because Ephraim מִזְבְּחֹ֖ת <WH4196> altars לַחֲטֹ֑א <WH2398> to sin הָיוּ־ <WH1961> have become ל֥וֹ מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <WH4196> altars לַחֲטֹֽא׃ <WH2398> shall be unto him to sin

[אֶכתֹוב־ כ] (אֶ֨כְתָּב־ <WH3789> wrote ל֔וֹ <WH3789> I have written ק) [רִבֹּו כ] (רֻבֵּ֖י <WH7239> myriad ק) תּֽוֹרָתִ֑י <WH8451> of my law כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> as זָ֖ר <WH2114> as a strange thing נֶחְשָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH2803> [but] they were counted

זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> [for] the sacrifices הַבְהָבַ֗י <WH1890> of mine offerings יִזְבְּח֤וּ <WH2076> They sacrifice בָשָׂר֙ <WH1320> flesh וַיֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> and eat יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God לֹ֣א <WH3808> no רָצָ֑ם <WH7521> accepteth עַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now יִזְכֹּ֤ר <WH2142> them not now will he remember עֲוֹנָם֙ <WH5771> their iniquity וְיִפְקֹ֣ד <WH6485> and visit חַטֹּאותָ֔ם <WH2403> their sins הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4714> to Egypt יָשֽׁוּבוּ׃ <WH7725> they shall return

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ח <WH7911> hath forgotten יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> For Israel אֶת־ <WH853> עֹשֵׂ֗הוּ <WH6213> his Maker וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> and buildeth הֵֽיכָל֔וֹת <WH1964> temples וִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> and Judah הִרְבָּ֖ה <WH7235> hath multiplied עָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities בְּצֻר֑וֹת <WH1219> fenced וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> but I will send אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּעָרָ֔יו <WH5892> upon his cities וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and it shall devour אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH759> the palaces ס
